description:
Serving innocent accident victims and their families throughout South Carolina's Lowcountry from our office in Georgetown, the dedicated legal professionals at the Law Office of David L Hood deliver unmatched advocacy and support to plaintiff clients who seek the maximum amount of compensation and benefits possible for their serious personal injury and wrongful death claims as well as matters concerning Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI).

The law firm's Georgetown location is one of the firm's 12 offices in the state. Founded in 1991 in Murrells Inlet, it has grown to become one of South Carolina's most prominent and successful personal injury and SSDI legal practices, and it has recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for those adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, mesothelioma and other preventable tragedies.

As further evidence of its success, the law firm's founder, attorney David L. Hood, is Notable peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and has earned the organization's Gold Client Champion award, as well. Moreover, the firm has received countless referrals and testimonials from its satisfied clients, and its team promises to do all it can to improve the likelihood that you will obtain the justice you deserve.

To schedule a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact the Law Office of David L Hood to set up an appointment. It also offers virtual consultations in order to help keep you and your family safe during these challenging times.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
